title: Errors by Service

options.content:
### Source Context - Dashboard scope: multi-source / filter-driven - Selected log source filter: `${log_source:text}` - Selected service filter: `${service_name:text}` - Selected source type filter: `${source_type:text}` - Selected file path filter: `${filename:text}` - File path values in scope:
`${filename:join:
}` - Note: `All` means no extra filter. File paths above are listed one per line for the current filter scope.

panels.title: Logs seen

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"}[$__range]))

panels.description: Shows Logs seen (5m) for the current dashboard filters and time range. Use this panel to detect anomalies and trends quickly.

panels.title: Error-like logs (5m) (expected idle)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])) or vector(0)

panels.description: Expected to be zero when system is healthy/idle. Non-zero indicates actionable anomalies.

panels.title: Error trend by source (5m) (expected idle)

targets.expr: sum by (log_source) (rate({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range]))

panels.description: Error-like rate split by log_source. If only one bar/line appears, only one source currently emits error-like logs.

panels.title: Top services with errors (15m) (expected idle)

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (service_name) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.description: Top service with error/fail signals over last 15m. 'Log lines (15m)' is aggregated count per service.

panels.title: Top sources with errors (15m) (expected idle)

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.description: Top log source with error/fail signals over last 15m. 'Log lines (15m)' is aggregated count per log source.

panels.title: Top filenames with errors (15m) (expected idle)

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (filename) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.description: Concrete file-path attribution for error/fail signals in last 15 minutes. Use legend to identify exact source files.

panels.title: Recent error signatures

targets.expr: {log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js"

panels.description: Latest error-like signatures over 6h for current filters.

panels.title: Error explorer (expected idle)

targets.expr: {log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" ${log_type}

panels.description: Expected to be zero when system is healthy/idle. Non-zero indicates actionable anomalies.

panels.title: Logs by volume

targets.expr: sum by (level) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} | regexp "(?i)(?P<level>debug|info|warn|warning|error|err|fatal|panic)" [$__range])) !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service"
sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)\binfo\b" [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)\bwarn(ing)?\b" [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)\b(err(or)?|fatal|panic|fail(ed)?)\b" [$__range]))

panels.description: Breakdown of log volume by severity (debug/info/warn/error) for the current filters over a 5 minute window.

panels.title: Errors by log_source
panels.description: Error-like event volume split by log_source over 5-minute windows.

targets.expr: sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range]))

panels.title: Top error sources now
panels.description: Top log sources by error-like events over 5 minutes.

targets.expr: topk(12, sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.title: Errors by source + service
panels.description: Top source/service pairs by error-like events in the last 15 minutes.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (log_source,service_name) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.title: Error share % by source
panels.description: Error-like share percent by source (errors divided by total logs).

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])) / sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} [$__range]))

panels.title: Top tools with errors
panels.description: Friendly tool names parsed from filename for error-like events.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (tool) (label_replace(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~".+[.]log"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range]), "tool", "$1", "filename", ".*/([^/]+)[.]log$")))

panels.title: Unknown-service errors by tool
panels.description: Friendly tool names for unknown_service error-like events (6h).

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (tool) (label_replace(count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name="unknown_service",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~".+[.]log"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range]), "tool", "$1", "filename", ".*/([^/]+)[.]log$")))

panels.title: Error burst ratio by source
panels.description: Burst ratio (5m errors vs normalized 30m baseline) by source; >1 means current spike.

targets.expr: sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])) / (sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" [$__range])) / 6)

panels.title: New error signatures (last 1h preview)
panels.description: Recent error-like signatures to quickly identify new failure themes.

targets.expr: {log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js"

panels.title: Critical fault lane by source
panels.description: Critical fault patterns only (panic, OOM, segfault, Xid, CUDA errors) split by source.

targets.expr: sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~"$service_name",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(fatal|panic|oom|segfault|xid|cuda error|gpu has fallen off the bus)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range]))

panels.title: Top source/service error pairs
panels.description: Top error-like source/service pairs over 5m.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (log_source,service_name) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~".+",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.title: Services with highest error volume
panels.description: Ranked services by error-like volume for rapid triage.

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (service_name) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~".*"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.title: Errors by service
panels.description: Error-like volume by service_name in the last 15m.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (service_name) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source",service_name=~".+",source_type=~"$source_type",filename=~"$filename"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

panels.title: Errors by inferred systemd service
panels.description: Parses service unit names from error logs (e.g., atlas-mcp.service) and ranks by error-like volume.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (svc) (count_over_time({log_source=~".+"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout|not permitted)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "Started atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "Stopped atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Scheduled restart job" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Failed with result 'exit-code'[.]" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" | regexp "(?P<svc>[A-Za-z0-9_.@-]+[.]service)" | svc=~".+" [$__range])))

panels.title: Errors by source
panels.description: Ranked error-like volume by log_source over 15m (post-suppression filters).

targets.expr: topk(12, sum by (log_source) (count_over_time({log_source=~"$log_source"} |~ "(?i)(error|err|fatal|panic|fail|failed|exit-code|oom|segfault|crash|denied|refused|timeout)" !~ "atlas-mcp[.]service" !~ "throw err;" !~ "/home/luce/apps/hex/dist/mcp/server/index[.]js" [$__range])))

description: Error triage dashboard for attribution by source/service with direct drilldown paths. Last settings update: 2026-02-19 03:41 UTC (metadata, variables, annotations, navigation hardening).
